column5: lots of good memories there Dan  Hope this year is as good for ya...if not BETTER!  Cheers  Simon
awesome year dan congrats
Have to get ya out in the spring to change the snot rocket problem LOL looka like a good year.

2010 was once again a very busy year. I didn't get out as much as I wanted too but still made a lot of great memories. Best part of 2010 was realizing that my kids are getting old enough to spend more time outdoors with me   . I still made time for fishing with friends but the majority of time was spent with my family fishing, camping and many other great things.  Monster Jam - I am never missing one of these shows again, just amazing!      Long Point Bay Ice Fishing - I only made it out once last year      Long Point Bay Perching - Twas a good year        I wish i had smaller hands        Carping - A new found love        Cottage Time -                Lakair - What happens at Lakair, stays at Lakair      Bassin' - Only targeted bass a few times this year          Pike - The year of the snotrocket          Restoule - A gem        Fish-A-Thon - Amazing Day        Let's see what 2011 brings!     Dan
That's a great post and a great review, You seem to have things balanced out well  Clarence
Nice Dan!!! You guys are inspiring me to make my own year end review. That one pike in the pile of weeds...you musta thought you had a 15 lber haha
lol I was hoping
Nice Dan!!  Was a pleasure meeting you at the Fish-A-Thon, looking forward to next year's event.
Nice report. Loved those carp pics.
You looks so sad all the time Dan ... look around you, you deserve to smile 24/7 !!
Great stuff Dan, looks like you had a good year.
Thanks everyone!  Wayne - I'm not the most photogenic person in the world but I do smile
Dan !!!!!!!! Thanks for that review. Oh i miss the soft water .Looks like a real blast. And ya look just fine in those pics, for one of us crsuty ole anglers (JK)   Paul
Nice review Dan. You must have thought that pike was a monster will all those weeds
Dan,  Looks like you're raising a couple of young, enthusiastic anglers.  That's great to see!
what a great review!!!  looks like you had some serious fun!
awesome year DB!  This summer we gotta hit the local CC lakes! I hear Shades Mills Calling!
Right on buddy looking forward to doing some fishin with u this year bud! Or at the very least drinking some beer down at the footage on the point!
Good job on the family and fishing.
Anytime!   Maybe we can actually go out in the same boat this year lol, definitely a couple beers while the kiddies play in the sand!
great year end report looks like it as a good year to me.....

That's a good year to me buddy, lot'f of variety. Wish I got some more Carp this season, such a fun fight. We should try and do some Pike fishing in May if your up for the challenge.  Thanks for sharing, MTBF

Great year end review and pics Dan Fishing with your kids is the best time of all.... I know cause fishing with my daughter is the best times along the shoreline  Tell me Dan, this certainly looks like a small musky doesn't it??    Thanks for sharing!!! Leechman
Always up for it Mike, especially since we never got out last year
It really does. I love the markings on that one.  It was actually caught in a trout creek
